f3559a5e-925c-459e-bb47-adccf988adec.description: American monster found at Burger King
instructions: Fry/grill/cook bacon and mince burger patty to preference (e.g. well done)
Add cheese  to patties until it melts to your liking
Layer burger meat and cheese onto bottom of bread roll
Lay bacon on top of stack, followed by top of bread roll
f3559a5e-925c-459e-bb47-adccf988adec.name: Bacon Double-cheeseburger
